ExampleDefinition.Title: Realtime Ticking Stock Charts
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Using the SciStockChart control, create's a real-time example with two series and a SciChartOverview
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Real-time Ticking Stock Charts</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">An MVVM example which showcases real-time ticking stock charts. Click the START button to start the example. Now you can zoom and pan the chart, it continues to tick and update in real-time.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Interactivity Options</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Switch from OHLC to Candlestick chart.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Select Pan or Zoom mode.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Zoom to extents via button or double-clicking on the chart.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Drag XAxis and YAxis to scale.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Drag the Overview control to scroll and scale.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Hover to see XY cursor values.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Change theme of the chart via the drop-down menu.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Tips</Run> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic">Notice how the chart ticks the latest bar, then adds a new bar and the chart scrolls one point to the left. The code that achieves this is in CreateRealTimeTickingStockChartViewModel.OnNewPrice method.</Run>
